snippet.title: Slime Rancher - PS4 Exclusive DLC Trailer
snippet.description:
PlayStation 4 EXCLUSIVE Downloadable Content is coming to Slime Rancher... for free!

Use the new DLC Playset to dress up your slimes as heroic adventurers and watch them fight off a hoard of toy bop goblins. Install the PS4-exclusive Sapphire Chroma Pack to give your ranch house, vacpack, and ranch tech a shiny, new paint job!

Coming soon to PlayStation 4! Pre-order now to receive a FREE Slime Rancher Dynamic Theme!

Pre-Order Here: http://www.slimerancher.com/PS4
EU Ranchers Pre-Order Here: http://bit.ly/SRPS4EU

The physical retail edition for Xbox One and PS4 will be in stores this September. Sign up for our newsletter for more information on when it will release! http://eepurl.com/dnL0cT

Developed by Monomi Park
http://www.slimerancher.com
http://www.monomipark.com

Follow us to stay up to date on news and events!

http://www.twitter.com/monomipark
http://www.instagram.com/monomi_park
http://www.blog.monomipark.com
